subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Helio Castroneves said his third Indy pole in seven years was more special because of the uncertainty he faced from the time he was indicted last October until the end of the trial April 17 in Miami.
snippet: Helio Castroneves said his third Indy pole in seven years was more special because of the uncertainty he faced from the time he was indicted last October until the end of the trial April 17 in Miami.
